content: My class moved online during the spring and summer semesters. Many of the support services are just now opening up on an appt basis only (and that's really just to return things not to check out new stuff). Our governor in New Mexico cannot been help a lot on top of issuing social distancing order which have kept our spread rate low but means we have been very isolated for weeks. I think I am a loser and lazy. We don't expect to be able to improve a lot or to attend sports/music events until they distribute a vaccine. Otherwise it will be just a failure
